mapper.select: SELECT d.id, d.name AS doctorName, hc.area, hc.introduction, hc.address, hc.zipCode, hc.tel, hc.name AS hospitalClinicName, hc.department, hc.url, hc.division, d.regDate, d.editDate FROM cooperationDoctor d, cooperationHospitalClinic hc WHERE d.id = #{id} AND d.cooperationHospitalClinic_id = hc.id

SELECT d.id, d.name AS doctorName, hc.area, hc.introduction, hc.address, hc.zipCode, hc.tel, hc.name AS hospitalClinicName, hc.department, hc.url, hc.division, d.regDate, d.editDate FROM cooperationDoctor d, cooperationHospitalClinic hc
d.cooperationHospitalClinic_id = hc.id
AND division = #{division}
AND (d.name LIKE concat('%', #{doctorName}, '%')
OR hc.area LIKE concat('%', #{area}, '%'))
AND area LIKE concat('%', #{areaQuery}, '%')
ORDER BY id DESC
LIMIT ${offset}, ${listCount}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cooperationDoctor (name, regDate, cooperationHospitalClinic_id) VALUES (#{doctorName}, now(), (SELECT id FROM cooperationHospitalClinic WHERE name = #{hospitalClinicName}))
mapper.update: UPDATE cooperationDoctor SET name=#{doctorName}, editDate=now(), cooperationHospitalClinic_id=(SELECT id FROM cooperationHospitalClinic WHERE name = #{hospitalClinicName}) WHERE id=#{id}
